hero.learningDescription: Learn English with our diverse educational materials tailored for all levels. Find something useful for you!

about.description: We offer educational materials and practical exercises which will increase your English level. There are different learning modules that you can pick up from.

grammar.title: Grammar
grammar.description: It’s a good idea to start with basics and master the main grammar structures

vocabulary.title: Vocabulary
vocabulary.description: Grammar is an engine oil of our car but vocabulary is the engine! Let’s pick up some new words :)

reading.title: Reading
reading.description: Let’s practice your reading skills. It will help you learn new phrases and understand English better!

listening.title: Listening
listening.description: To understand oral speech we should listen to it quite often and get used to it! Try out our listening tasks :)
